description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Main Purpose of Position:
              
              The IT Technical Specialist is responsible for providing daily and proactive support to approximately 70 users located in 3 countries – Vietnam, China, India. This includes responding to IT service outages, poor system performance, analyzing and understanding customers’ or business needs, developing improvement plans to fix poor IT systems. This role also will work closely with the US headquarters IT team and to ensure quality IT standards are met.  The key purpose of the role is to ensure excellence for infrastructure technologies and services for the International business.
              

              Key Responsibilities:
              
              •	Answer daily IT support requests from users.
              
              •	Be responsible for ensuring the smooth operation of IT infrastructure.
              
              •	Apply best practices to provide health-check, assessment, evaluation, improvement recommendations on entire network, infrastructure, and computers of the International business.
              
              •	Perform necessary troubleshooting to ensure reliable and stable IT services and system operations.
              
              •	Be responsible for reviewing a company's computer systems, documentations, workflow, and make recommendations for improvements.
              
              •	Adapt plans to meet service and/or operational challenges. Identifies and resolves technical, operational, risk management, and organizational challenges.
              
              •	Work with US IT team to ensure IT standards are maintained, support IT initiatives that affect International business.
              
              •	Keep current on new technologies and ensure the business and users are using systems properly.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Skills & Competencies
              
              •	A recognised Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent
              
              •	Minimum 5 - 10 years of experience in helpdesk, infrastructure, with at least 3 years of experience in a multicultural/multi-national company.
              
              •	Demonstrated experience in managing and supporting infrastructure in a multinational corporate environment.
              
              •	Demonstrated commitment to excellence and good user experience
              
              •	Ability to plan, review and monitor work progress
              
              •	Fluent in English with good communication and writing skills
              
              •	Strong knowledge and background in modern networking and wireless equipment and monitoring systems
              
              •	Have worked with Cloud systems such as Microsoft Office365, Azure, Cloud platforms
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
